dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, this video, uh, out of Kazakhstan, it's gone absolutely viral, nearly nine million views.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, this video, uh, out of Kazakhstan, it's gone absolutely viral, nearly nine million views.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A heartwarming video filmed in a village near Shymkent during the Nauryz celebrations has gone viral, garnering nearly 9 million views in just a few days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Nine million? Really? For what, exactly? A cat video?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nine million? Really? For what, exactly? A cat video?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, it's actually, um, a heartwarming moment during Nauryz celebrations near Shymkent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, it's actually, um, a heartwarming moment during Nauryz celebrations near Shymkent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A heartwarming video filmed in a village near Shymkent during the Nauryz celebrations has gone viral...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: 'Heartwarming.' Sure. Is it like, a baby animal rescue or something equally predictable?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Heartwarming.' Sure. Is it like, a baby animal rescue or something equally predictable?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's kids. The adults leave the table, and then, like, a group of excited children just rushes in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's kids. The adults leave the table, and then, like, a group of excited children just rushes in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The clip, shared on Instagram by Nauryzbek Rsymov, captures a touching moment: after the adult guests leave the table, a group of excited children rushes in...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Rushes in for what? The leftovers? Sounds less heartwarming, more, uh, chaotic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rushes in for what? The leftovers? Sounds less heartwarming, more, uh, chaotic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But a smiling grandmother greets them! It, um, it apparently radiates warmth and nostalgia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But a smiling grandmother greets them! It, um, it apparently radiates warmth and nostalgia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...a group of excited children rushes in, greeted by a smiling grandmother. The scene radiates warmth and nostalgia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Radiates warmth. Yeah, okay. Was it filmed with a professional crew or something? 'Unplanned,' I bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Radiates warmth. Yeah, okay. Was it filmed with a professional crew or something? 'Unplanned,' I bet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: The guy who filmed it, Rsymov, he actually said he never expected it. He, like, just captured the moment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The guy who filmed it, Rsymov, he actually said he never expected it. He, like, just captured the moment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nauryzbek Rsymov... admitted he never expected the video to gain such traction. 'I just captured the moment when the guests were leaving, and the kids were eagerly waiting for their turn.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: 'Just captured it.' Conveniently. With nine million views. How, uh, organic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Just captured it.' Conveniently. With nine million views. How, uh, organic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: People are calling it the 'sweetest thing' and 'what true happiness looks like.' Thousands of comments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People are calling it the 'sweetest thing' and 'what true happiness looks like.' Thousands of comments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The wholesome footage quickly spread across social media, racking up around 15,000 comments. 'The sweetest thing here is the smiling grandmother,' ... 'This is what true happiness looks like,' users commented.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, come on. That's, uh, that's just comments sections being comments sections. Easily generated, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, come on. That's, uh, that's just comments sections being comments sections. Easily generated, too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: He said it resonated with people's simplicity and sincerity. That it wasn't planned.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said it resonated with people's simplicity and sincerity. That it wasn't planned.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think people resonated with its simplicity and sincerity. It wasnâ„¢t planned'I just happened to record it at the right time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Sincerity? Or, like, just good PR for the region? What was that other thing, the blogger who did some, uh, weird beshbarmak stunt?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sincerity? Or, like, just good P R for the region? What was that other thing, the blogger who did some, uh, weird beshbarmak stunt?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a popular blogger stunned Kazakhstanis with his unique interpretation of the beloved national meal, beshbarmak.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, the article mentions that. But this is, um, this is kids and a grandma.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, the article mentions that. But this is, um, this is kids and a grandma.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Pure. Totally spontaneous. Always the way these things hit nine million views.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Pure. Totally spontaneous. Always the way these things hit nine million views.
